title: Mexi Hominy
directions: In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together hominy, tomatoes, green chiles, cumin, and garlic. Cook about 7 minutes. Stir in cilantro. Remove from heat, divide into bowls, and top with cheese.
ingredients: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans white or yellow hominy, rinsed and drained
